name: Sonja Kay
offering: Business Consulting, Intuition Coaching, Spiritual Coaching
what_you_do: I originally became a coach in my twenties by creating many start-up food businesses and on-selling them to other people searching for a business that would enable them to be their 'own boss'.
who_you_serve: Many of the buyers were wanting to move away from their routine day jobs and into a lifestyle in which they could develop and be the owner of their own destiny.
business_focus: Mentoring clients in expressing their purpose through formulating their life work into their own creative businesses.
